entries.title_d: Just before his destruction, Nej'a sent out a signal to another vessel. This vessel probably will have information on the other two targets. Capture and bring the Velocity smuggler back to Insurgent.
entries.title: Dathomir System: Capture the Velocity Smuggler
entries.thanks_5: You think you have won? Don't make me laugh.
entries.thanks_4: You think you have won? Don't make me laugh.
entries.thanks_1: You have defeated them in battle. But you shall not win the war.
entries.taunt_5: You will be quite a prize, Imperial dog.
entries.taunt_3: You will be quite a prize, Imperial dog.
entries.target_disabled: The communications vessel's engines are offline. Prepare to reprogram the ships autopilot.
entries.split_quest_alert: Warning! Enemy fighters incoming at high speeds with weapons armed.
entries.recovery_success: We will begin our scans of the vessel to see if we can discover any lead on the location of the other two. Stand by for further instructions.
entries.quest_recover_d: Move in close and wait for the capture process to begin.
entries.quest_location_d: The Velocity Smuggler is located inside the Dathomir system. Intercept and capture that vessel before it can escape the system.
entries.quest_escort_d: Escort the smuggler to a safe location for a jump back into Imperial controlled space. Be on the look out for enemy craft who will probably attempt to recapture this ship.
entries.quest_disable_d: Intercept and disable the Velocity smuggler in order to capture it.
entries.panic_5: Do not let me be dishonored by being captured, my brothers.
entries.panic_3: Do not let me be dishonored by being captured, my brothers.
entries.failed_escape: Your blundering incompetence has let that ship escape. Make a full report to your superior.
entries.failed_destroy: We needed that vessel in order to help us find the other two cohorts of Nej'a. You failed the Emperor and the Empire. Report to your superior.
entries.capture_phase_2: You might take us but our masters already are aware of what you have done. You should be be prepared to feel the retribution of a jedi.
entries.capture_phase_1: You really don't know what is going on do you? Our masters are more powerful then one such as yourself can ever understand.
entries.capture_complete: Autopilot reprogrammed. Returning vessel to Imperial space.
entries.arrival_phase_2: Location updated in your nav computer. It would appear that the communications ship is attempting to flee. Track it down and capture it.
entries.arrival_phase_1: Tracking communications ship. Stand by for nav coordinates.
entries.angry_disable: I will not be offline for very long! I know I can get this thing working again.
entries.abort: Yeah, good plan there. You don't want to mess with our masters.
